name: To The Core (itch) (Cubes & Tubes)
description:
A puzzle platformer with a portal gun and shooter elements that tells the story of a failed journey to the center of the earth.

Embark on a journey to the center of the earth and don't forget the portal gun. Watch out for huge jellyfish and remember: "Corporate ethics prohibits wearing the Black Mesa insignia".

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/to-the-core-7
